name: Yumbers: The yummy numbers game
description:
Yumbers is a small puzzle game that reinvents the way you play with numbers. A moment of learning how to play leads to a lifetime of enjoyment.

CUTE EXPERIENCE -YUMMY NUMBERS-
The numbers are hungry! They enjoy eating each other, reacting to the swipe of your finger. Everything has been designed with the utmost care and devotion to offer you a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience.

ORIGINAL MECHANICS
Explore the deep challenges of our little game and make your mind grow beyond imagination, awakening areas you didn't realise you had.

Find your favourite game mode:
STORY MODE: No time limits for you to relax and take your time in planning your moves.
ARCADE MODE: Think fast about what to do with the pieces that are falling faster and faster. An infinite challenge that makes your mind work overtime while still having fun.

CHARACTERISTICS:
- 2 game modes and more than 200 puzzles to resolve.
- A truly unique entertainment experience.
- Universal app for iPhone and iPad.
- Automatic Cloud synchronization. Your progress is automatically saved on all devices.
- Exciting soundtrack.
- Cute graphics and animations.
- Achievements and records lists.
- Available in 11 languages.

Join the growing community of Yumbers fans in our official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Yumbers-Community-1041591275930656/
We are working on free updates. We would be very pleased to receive comments and suggestions at our email address: support@ivanovichgames.com
